summary: Paint Creek is an unincorporated community in southeast Haskell County, Texas, United States, in north central Texas.
full_text:
Haskell is a city in central Haskell County, Texas, in the United States. As of the 2010 census, the city population was 3,322. It is the county seat of Haskell County.
^ "American FactFinder". United States Census Bureau. Retrieved 2008-01-31. 
^ "US Board on Geographic Names". United States Geological Survey. 2007-10-25. Retrieved 2008-01-31. 
^ "Find a County". National Association of Counties. Retrieved 2011-06-07.
title: Haskell, Texas
